name: Shared Expenses Tracker - Notion Template
description: Track the expenses you share with someone else and how much you owe each other.The Shared Expenses Tracker for Notion is the perfect solution for anyone sharing expenses with someone. It lets you track expenses and split them as you see fit. With real-time automatic balance calculation, you're always aware of who owes how much to whom.
